data.name: GetOrderbyShowroom
data.value: Select OrderId, CustomerId, VehicleId, ShowroomId, OrderStatusId, FinalPrice, hasLoan, DeliveryDate from [UnicoVehicle].[order].[Order] where DeletedDate is null and ShowroomId = @showroomId

data.name: GetOrderbyShowroomandVehicle
data.value: Select OrderId, CustomerId, VehicleId, ShowroomId, OrderStatusId, FinalPrice, hasLoan, DeliveryDate from [UnicoVehicle].[order].[Order] where DeletedDate is null and ShowroomId = @showroomId and VehicleId = @vehicleId

data.name: GetOrderbyCustomer
data.value: Select OrderId, CustomerId, VehicleId, ShowroomId, OrderStatusId, FinalPrice, hasLoan, DeliveryDate from [UnicoVehicle].[order].[Order] where DeletedDate is null and CustomerId = @customerId

data.name: GetOrderbyId
data.value: Select OrderId, CustomerId, VehicleId, ShowroomId, OrderStatusId, FinalPrice, hasLoan, DeliveryDate from [UnicoVehicle].[order].[Order] where DeletedDate is null and OrderId = @orderId

data.name: GetOrderbyShowroomCustomer
data.value: Select OrderId, CustomerId, VehicleId, ShowroomId, OrderStatusId, FinalPrice, hasLoan, DeliveryDate from [UnicoVehicle].[order].[Order] where DeletedDate is null and ShowroomId = @showroomId and CustomerId = @customerId

data.name: InsertOrder
data.value: Insert into [UnicoVehicle].[order].[Order] (CustomerId, VehicleId, ShowroomId, OrderStatusId, FinalPrice, hasLoan, DeliveryDate, CreatedDate) values (@customerId, @vehicleId, @showroomId, @orderStatusId, @finalPrice, @hasLoan, @deliveryDate, @createdDate)

data.name: UpdateOrder
data.value: Update [UnicoVehicle].[order].[Order] set FinalPrice = @finalPrice, DeliveryDate = @deliveryDate, ModifiedDate = @modifiedDate where OrderId = @orderId

data.name: GetmaxOrderId
data.value: Select Max(OrderId) as OrderId from [UnicoVehicle].[order].[Order] where DeletedDate is null and CustomerId = @customerId and VehicleId = @vehicleId and ShowroomId = @showroomId and OrderStatusId = @orderStatusId

data.name: GetPostBuyingDetailbyId
data.value: Select PostBuyingDetailId, InsuranceCompanyId, InsuranceTypeId, LoanEMI, InsurancePremium, RemainingFreeService, InsuranceValidUpto, TaxValidUpto, PaymentReceived from [UnicoVehicle].[order].[PostBuyingDetail] where DeletedDate is null and OrderId = @orderId

data.name: InsertPostBuyingDetail
data.value: Insert into [UnicoVehicle].[order].[PostBuyingDetail] (OrderId, InsuranceCompanyId, InsuranceTypeId, LoanEMI, InsurancePremium, RemainingFreeService, InsuranceValidUpto, TaxValidUpto, PaymentReceived, CreatedDate) values (@orderId, @insuranceCompanyId, @insuranceTypeId, @loanEMI, @insurancePremium, @remainingFreeService, @insuranceValidUpto, @taxValidUpto, @paymentReceived, @createdDate)

data.name: UpdatePostBuyingDetail
data.value: Update [UnicoVehicle].[order].[PostBuyingDetail] set InsuranceCompanyId = @insuranceCompanyId, InsuranceTypeId = @insuranceTypeId, InsurancePremium = @insurancePremium, InsuranceValidUpto = @insuranceValidUpto, TaxValidUpto = @taxValidUpto, RemainingFreeService = @remainingFreeService, PaymentReceived = @paymentReceived, ModifiedDate = @modifiedDate where PostBuyingDetailId = @postBuyingDetailId

data.name: GetBoughtAccessories
data.value: Select BoughtAccessoriesId, AccessoriesId from [UnicoVehicle].[order].[BoughtAccessories] where DeletedDate is null and OrderId = @orderId
